extension.summary: [COLOR white]ADDON ENERGIA[/COLOR]
extension.description: [COLOR white][B]Necesario YouTube, f4mTester, SportDevil, Plexus-Acestream y un reproductor de torrent.[/B][/COLOR]

extension.summary: f4mTester
SportsDevil
extension.description: [I]There can only be one.[/I][CR][CR]Unofficial Kodi Addon.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Plugin helps you to watch videos from p2p torrent-networks, without full predownload.
extension.description: It also can add, control torrents and play downloaded files with external torrent-client (uTorrent, Transmisson, Vuse, Deluge, qBittorrent) or python-libtorrent.
extension.summary: Плагин позволяет просматривать видео из пиринговых торрент-сетей, не дожидаясь полного скачивания.
extension.description: Так же плагин может добавлять, проигрывать и управлять скачками в торрент клиентах (uTorrent, Transmisson, Deluge и Vuse, qBittorrent) или средставми python-libtorrent.
extension.summary: Complemento que nos permite ver vídeos que se distribuyen en redes BitTorrent sin necesidad de descargarlos previamente por completo.
extension.description: También gestiona torrents y nos deja elegir entre su propio cliente interno y otros externos (μTorrent, Transmission, Deluge, Vuze, qBittorrent), el cliente BitTorrent con el que realizar las descargas.

extension.summary: Torrent player
extension.description: This add-on launches android torrent/magnet video players for playing torrent videos, also includes AceStream engine client and bridge to other torrent player plugins.
extension.summary: Reproductor de torrent
extension.description: Este add-on ejecuta aplicaciones externas de Android para reproducir videos por torrent o magnet, tambien incorpora cliente para el motor Acestream (Android/Windows/Linux) y puede enlazar con otros plugins.
extension.disclaimer: This KODI AddOn does not contain internal or direct links to any type of copyright video, it's only a torrent storage-redirect-player.
Este AddOn de KODI no contiene enlaces internos o directos a material protegido por copyright de ningun tipo, solamente es un Archivador-Catalogador-Reproductor-Redireccionador de archivos torrent.
extension.news: Scraper de torrents/magnets mejorado, fallos corregidos, etc.[CR]Visita el foro para mas informacion:[CR]http://www.htcmania.com/showthread.php?t=995348[CR]Gracias a todos por vuestro apoyo.

extension.summary: SopCast and AceStream for Kodi
extension.description: Plexus - Any complex structure containing an intricate network of parts. Plexus brings native peer-to-peer support (AceStream and SopCast) for Kodi Entertainment Center for several platforms.[CR][CR]Documentation: (missing)

Plexus - Uma estrutura complexa constituída por uma rede de partes. O Plexus adiciona suporte peer-to-peer nativo (AceStream e Sopcast) ao Kodi Entertainment Center para várias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentação: (em falta)
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host nor distribute any of the content you may watch using this addon. The author has no part in the development of any included technologies. When seeking help in Kodi's forum please respect rules (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

Os autores não alojam nem distribuem nenhum do conteúdo que poderá ser reproduzido a partir deste addon. Os autores não têm qualquer parte no desenvolvimento de qualquer uma das tecnologias. Se procurar ajuda no fórum oficial do Kodi por favor respeite as regras do fórum (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

extension.summary: script.module.libtorrent is a Kodi module that makes easy import of python-libtorrent for you.
script.module.libtorrent - модуль Kodi, который упрощает импорт библиотеки python-libtorrent.
script.module.libtorrent es un módulo de Kodi que facilita la importación de la librería python-libtorrent.
Downloads torrents and share it over HTTP
Загружает торренты и раздает их по HTTP
extension.description: Обеспечивает последовательную (sequential) загрузку торрентов для потокового онлайн просмотра через HTTP. Основан на библиотеке LibTorrent.
Provides sequential torrent downloading for online streaming video and other media over HTTP.

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.

extension.summary: StreamLink Proxy DS
extension.description: Streamlink proxy for Kodi

extension.summary: Streamlink Library
extension.description: Streamlink Library for Kodi

extension.summary: Pure Python implementation of the cryptographic libraries required by Streamlink
AceStream client
Downloads torrents and share it over HTTP
Загружает торренты и раздает их по HTTP
extension.description: Обеспечивает последовательную (sequential) загрузку торрентов для потокового онлайн просмотра через HTTP. Основан на библиотеке LibTorrent.
Provides sequential torrent downloading for online streaming video and other media over HTTP.

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.

extension.summary: Proxy for f4m
extension.description: Use this addon to play F4m v1 and v2 streams
